string-array.name: expectations
string-array.item: We expect to gain more knowledge and understanding that I can apply in both academic and real life.
We expect to have fun and understand the lessons that will be taught.
I expect this course to be challenging but also rewarding.
I also expect to improve my skills and become more confident in applying what I learn.
fifth

string-array.name: contributions
string-array.item: I will give my effort in completing assignments and projects on time.
I will always listen, attend my classes and pass the requirements.
I will participate and contribute to group activities, and communicate properly.
I will help organize group work and ensure everyone participates.
fifth

string-array.name: motivations
string-array.item: I am motivated by my goal to succeed academically and personally.
I am motivated because of our family\'s financial status
I am motivated to pass this course with a satisfactory grade so I can graduate on time.
I am motivated by my dream to have a stable and fulfilling career in the future.
fifth

string-array.name: hindrances
string-array.item: I sometimes struggle with time management because of different responsibilities.
I love sleeping.
I also acknowledge that I have many hobbies that may distract me from being productive.
Sometimes unexpected events or personal problems may also affect my focus and performance.
fifth

string-array.name: members
string-array.item: Carino, Ian Kyril
Gaddi, Noel
Molina, Trisha
Recondo, Juan Miguel
Tungcul, Marjorie
